channel.title: Please check if there is anything wrong.
channel.description:
virt-manager@debian:~$ ls -l total 1072508 -rw-r--r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 39649 Oct 20 2015 WHONIX_BINARY_LICENSE_AGREEMENT -rw-r--r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 4228 Oct 20 2015 WHONIX_DISCLAIMER -rw-r--r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 172 Oct 20 2015 Whonix_external_network-15.0.0.4.9.xml -rw-r--r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 2399 Oct 20 2015 Whonix-Gateway-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.xml -rw-r--r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 97 Oct 20 2015 Whonix_internal_network-15.0.0.4.9.xml -rw-r--r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 2305 Oct 20 2015 Whonix-Workstation-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.xml -rw-r--r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 1098145148 Oct 30 13:59 Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.libvirt.xz drwxr-xr-x 3 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 31 16:51 ダウンロード drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 デスクトップ drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 テンプレート drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 ドキュメント drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 ビデオ drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 公開 drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Nov 1 10:22 画像 drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 音楽 virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-define Whonix_external*.xml error: Failed to define network from Whonix_external_network-15.0.0.4.9.xml error: operation failed: network 'Whonix-External' already exists with uuid d7ed84e8-4d18-4bb7-890b-ea4a0017f1ba
virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-define Whonix_internal*.xml error: Failed to define network from Whonix_internal_network-15.0.0.4.9.xml error: operation failed: network 'Whonix-Internal' already exists with uuid a9bb2952-5919-4cef-a087-4f0fdac21cf1
virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-autostart Whonix-External Network Whonix-External marked as autostarted
virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-start Whonix-External error: Failed to start network Whonix-External error: Requested operation is not valid: network is already active
virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-autostart Whonix-Internal Network Whonix-Internal marked as autostarted
virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-start Whonix-Internal error: Failed to start network Whonix-Internal error: Requested operation is not valid: network is already active
virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system define Whonix-Gateway*.xml error: Failed to define domain from Whonix-Gateway-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.xml error: operation failed: domain 'Whonix-Gateway' already exists with uuid 216484d4-6477-4234-aac3-b8b0e1ba0faf
virt-manager@debian:~$ virt-manager@debian:~$ virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system define Whonix-Workstation*.xml error: Failed to define domain from Whonix-Workstation-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.xml error: operation failed: domain 'Whonix-Workstation' already exists with uuid 1625574b-c11c-4633-9e6c-67b5106ca563
virt-manager@debian:~$

item.title: Please check if there is anything wrong.
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Hello. There’s nothing wrong. You don;t need to re-import the network settings after the initial install. The future updates only need the VMs files to be defined

Read full topic
item.source: Please check if there is anything wrong.

item.title: Please check if there is anything wrong.
item.dc:creator: VQNVQM
item.description:
virt-manager@debian:~$ ls -l
total 1072508
-rw-r–r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 39649 Oct 20 2015 WHONIX_BINARY_LICENSE_AGREEMENT
-rw-r–r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 4228 Oct 20 2015 WHONIX_DISCLAIMER
-rw-r–r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 172 Oct 20 2015 Whonix_external_network-15.0.0.4.9.xml
-rw-r–r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 2399 Oct 20 2015 Whonix-Gateway-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.xml
-rw-r–r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 97 Oct 20 2015 Whonix_internal_network-15.0.0.4.9.xml
-rw-r–r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 2305 Oct 20 2015 Whonix-Workstation-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.xml
-rw-r–r-- 1 virt-manager virt-manager 1098145148 Oct 30 13:59 Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.libvirt.xz
drwxr-xr-x 3 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 31 16:51 ダウンロード
drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 デスクトップ
drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 テンプレート
drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 ドキュメント
drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 ビデオ
drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 公開
drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Nov 1 10:22 画像
drwxr-xr-x 2 virt-manager virt-manager 4096 Oct 27 11:54 音楽
virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-define Whonix_external*.xml
error: Failed to define network from Whonix_external_network-15.0.0.4.9.xml
error: operation failed: network ‘Whonix-External’ already exists with uuid d7ed84e8-4d18-4bb7-890b-ea4a0017f1ba

virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-define Whonix_internal*.xml
error: Failed to define network from Whonix_internal_network-15.0.0.4.9.xml
error: operation failed: network ‘Whonix-Internal’ already exists with uuid a9bb2952-5919-4cef-a087-4f0fdac21cf1

virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-autostart Whonix-External
Network Whonix-External marked as autostarted

virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-start Whonix-External
error: Failed to start network Whonix-External
error: Requested operation is not valid: network is already active

virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-autostart Whonix-Internal
Network Whonix-Internal marked as autostarted

virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system net-start Whonix-Internal
error: Failed to start network Whonix-Internal
error: Requested operation is not valid: network is already active

virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system define Whonix-Gateway*.xml
error: Failed to define domain from Whonix-Gateway-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.xml
error: operation failed: domain ‘Whonix-Gateway’ already exists with uuid 216484d4-6477-4234-aac3-b8b0e1ba0faf

virt-manager@debian:~$
virt-manager@debian:~$
virt-manager@debian:~$ virsh -c qemu:///system define Whonix-Workstation*.xml
error: Failed to define domain from Whonix-Workstation-XFCE-15.0.0.4.9.xml
error: operation failed: domain ‘Whonix-Workstation’ already exists with uuid 1625574b-c11c-4633-9e6c-67b5106ca563

virt-manager@debian:~$

Read full topic
item.source: Please check if there is anything wrong.
